name: Billiard Master Pro
description:
Billiard Master is a realistic 3D pool game with single player. If you like billiards, you will fall in love with it!
You can easily control it in the game, no matter you are a green hand or a expert. Aiming line will help you. But difficulty is from new level to pro level. Challenge yourself and improve you skills by the 3D realistic game. You will be excited at the stunning HD graphics. Come to download it!

Features of Billiard Master:
1. Realistic 3D ball animation
2. Touch control for moving the stick
3. Special level design by our professionals
4. Single Player Mode.
5. Super realistic ball physics.
